2.name: !simmerdown
2.description: Displays how many times someone says 'Simmer down'
2.rules: **!simmerdown [person]:** Says how many times the specified person said 'Simmer Down'. If no person is specified, it defaults to the user

rules:
**!21 deal [bet] [match the dealer]:** Starts game of blackjack with specified bet
--Match the dealer pays 3:1 if either of your cards match the dealer's face up card. It isn't a mandatory bet
**!21 hit:** Gives player additional card
**!21 doubledown:** Doubles your bet but only lets you take 1 card per hand
**!21 split:**  Lets you split your hand into two hands if your original hand was watching cards. Note: Can't hit split aces
**!21 stay:** Makes player stay for their current hand
**!21 surrender:** Quits the hand but only gives back half of what the player bet. Note: Can't be done after splitting or hitting
**!21 status:** Resends dealer and player hands

6.name: !assblast
rules: **!assblast standings:** Lists the current standings for the assblast league
**!assblast clear:** Clears the assblast standings
**!assblast points [Player] [Amount of Points]:** Adds or subtracts the specified amount of points from the specified player

7.name: !bank
description: Displays how much gbp a user has
Private accounts can hold upto 20000 gbp
rules: **!bank [person]:** Shows Public gbp of specified person. Defaults to user if noone is specified
**!bank account:** Shows you your private bank account
**!bank deposit [amount]:** Lets you deposit gbp into your private account
**!bank withdraw:** Lets you withdraw gbp from your private account

8.name: !insults
8.description: Allows you to see and set who is being insulted
8.rules: **!insults [person]:** Makes it so the bot insults the specified person. If no user is specified it shows who is currently being insulted

9.name: !delete
description: Can only be used 5 times per day
9.rules: **!delete [amount]:** Deletes specified number of messages. If no amount is specified it defaults to 1

10.name: !gg
description: Try to guess a number between 1 and 100 with 3 guesses
rules: **!gg bet [bet amount]:** Starts game with specified bet
**!gg guess [guess number]:** Use 1 of your guesses to try and guess the correct number
**!gg status:** Names if anyone is playing and what guess they are on

11.name: !kumiko
description: Posts a picture of Kumiko from the critically acclaimed show Sound! Euphonium

12.name: !powerball
12.description: Enters you into the Powerball for 5 gbp per ticket
rules: **!powerball buy [Number of Tickets]:** Purchases the nubmer of specified tickets. If no number is specified, it defaults to 1
**!powerball stats:** Shows the number of tickets that have been bought and the amount of gbp in the lottery

13.name: !transfer
13.description: Allows a user to transfer gbp to another user
13.rules: **!transfer [user] [amount]:** Transfer the specified amount of gpb to the specified user

14.name: !herald
description: Allows you to request a herald who speaks on your behalf
rules: **!herald buy [Number of Sets]:** Allows you to rent a herald who will say specified messages for you. If no number is specified it defaults to 1
**!herald stats:** Shows you who currently is using the herald and how many uses they have left
**!herald say [message]:** Makes the herald say your message

15.name: !names
15.description: Lists the names of all the people on the server

16.name: !changelog
16.description: Displays list of everything that was changed in the latest update

17.name: !boo
description: Lets you see and choose who is being booed
rules: **!boo [user]:** Makes the bot boo the specified user. If no user is specified it states who is currently being booed

18.name: !steal
description: Steals a percentage of what you pay from another user
18.rules: **!steal [user] [amount paid for heist]:** Lets you steal from the specified user, paying the specified amount

19.name: !achievements
19.description: Lets you track achievements gotten in the server
rules: **!achievements:** Lists your personal achievements
**!achievements [name]:** List achievements of given person
**!achievements list:** Lists all possible achievements

20.name: !bwg
description: Lets you play the Banned Word Game
rules: **!bwg bet [target] [bet] [word]:** Starts the banned word game
**!bwg status:** If sent to the group chat, it displays everyone who is currently being targeted. If sent to the bot through dms it displays your current game
**!bwg reset:** Cancels your game in case you want to switch who you are targeting. Your bet is not refunded
**!bwg rules:** Explains some basic rules about the banned word game

21.name: !roulette
21.description: Lets you play roulette with multiple people
rules: **!roulette bet [Time]:** Starts roulette game where betting ends after [Time] seconds
**!roulette list:** Shows you the roulette board, basics, and payouts
**!roulette numbers:** Shows you the last 10 numbers called

22.name: !button
22.description: The button has a 90% chance of giving you 100 gbp but a 10% chance of taking 1000 gbp
rules: **!button:** Pushes the button
**!button stats:** Shows you stats relating to the button

23.name: !loan
23.description: Lets you track and take out loans with others
rules: **!loan [person]:** Shows the specified person's creditor/debtor if applicable. Defaults to user if no person is specified

**!loan offer [person] [amount] [interest rate] [days to collect]:** Offers a loan to the specified person for the specified amount and interest rate. After [days] number of days the loan will begin to be automatically collected
**!loan accept:** Lets you accept a loan if you have been offered one
**!loan pay:** Lets you pay off your loan early

24.name: !ceelo
24.description: Lets you play ceelo with others
rules: **!ceelo start [bet]:** Creates a joinable game of Ceelo with for [bet] gbp. You only have 15 seconds to enter the game
**!ceelo join:** Lets you join a game
**!ceelo roll:** Lets you roll the die
**!ceelo wash:** Lets you roll the die, but the hand doesn't count
**!ceelo status [game]:** Lets you see the status of the specified game. If no game is specified, it shows a list of all actve games
**!ceelo basics:** Gives a list of basic rules and hand values
